va-pension-with-disability.title: Veteran's Pension with Disability
va-pension-with-disability.headline: Veteran's Pension with Disability
va-pension-with-disability.source.name: U.S. Department of Veteran Affairs
va-pension-with-disability.summary: Monthly payments to wartime veterans who meet certain age or disability requirements, and who have income and net worth within certain limits.
va-pension-with-disability.eligibility.a: discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
